claims.object: Instructing the OS to listen on a specific port

surface_layer.definition: A software application that uses HTTP (or HTTPS) to serve files to users, in response to their requests.

deep_layer.mechanism: Listens for client requests on a specific port, retrieves the requested file, and sends it to the client.
deep_layer.origin: Developed to serve web pages to users.

epistemic_metadata.source: network programming - Understanding TCP/Ip layering through
